General.Name: Kim Teck Cheong Consolidated Bhd
General.Description: Kim Teck Cheong Consolidated Berhad engages in distribution of consumer-packaged goods in East Malaysia and Brunei. It distributes food and beverage, personal care, cosmetics, household, baby care, over-the-counter drugs, and health supplements, as well as perishable goods. The company also offers bakery products under the Creamos and Gardenia brands. In addition, it provides warehousing and property development services. Kim Teck Cheong Consolidated Berhad distributes its products through 8,523 sales and distribution points. The company was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia. Kim Teck Cheong Consolidated Berhad is a subsidiary of KTC Holdings Sdn Bhd.
